@@ -1,3 +1,7 @@

 	* ree.c (struct ext_cand): Remove GTY markers.

@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

 	* gnat.dg/discr38.adb: Don't use ^M line endings.

@@ -291,6 +291,7 @@ for_each_index (tree *addr_p, bool (*cbck) (tree, tree *, void *), void *data)
 
 	case VAR_DECL:
 	case PARM_DECL:
+	case CONST_DECL:
 	case STRING_CST:
 	case RESULT_DECL:
 	case VECTOR_CST:
